page.title: 09LAW AND ORDER, LANGUAGE
page.content: {LAW AND ORDER }A police house is in the villge. Police cars regularly move through the village and police can be contacted by the emergency telephone system. Courts are situated at Retford and county Courts at Nottingham. {LANGUAGE }English with various accents reflect the different parts of the country, people have come from to work at the Power Stations and Rampton Hospital. {LIFE STYLE }in North Leverton. Children, teenagers and adults are fairly fashion conscious. The children wear fashionable clothes such as Jeans and jackets and some teenagers have punk hair styles. Hair generally is short. Some of the favourite 'Pop' groups are Wham, Culture Club, Duran Duran, Tears for fears and Frankie goes to Hollywood. There are no cafes in Leverton.
